data.title: Missouri Department of Revenue Contact Information
data.text:
Contact Information/Office Locations

The Department of Revenueâ€™s Central Office is located in Jefferson City, but there are offices all over Missouri to assist you with your motor vehicle titling and registration or driver license transactions.

Central Office

Harry S Truman State Office Building

301 West High Street, Jefferson City, MO 65101

Driving Directions to Harry S Truman Building

State Holidays (offices are closed on these dates): http://content.oa.mo.gov/commissioners-office/state-holidays

Contact Phone Numbers and Email:

Driver License: 573-526-2407

dlbmail@dor.mo.gov

Click here for mailing addresses and more information!

Motor Vehicle: 573-526-3669

Ask Motor Vehicle!

Taxation

Individual Income Tax

Business Tax

Interactive Payment Line: 888-929-0513

Open Records Request (Sunshine Law):

OpenRecords@dor.mo.gov

To obtain a specific telephone number for the type of service you need, please click on the applicable links below.
